latestReviews.author: Marelle L.
latestReviews.title: Great company, easy to use
latestReviews.reviewText: Switching to Future Super was as easy as clicking a few buttons, after that they consolidated my super from other funds and set up my account for me. Since then I have had a great experience with the website and layout - I am able to select the type of investments I want my money to go towards and I trust Future Super to invest my super appropriately.

latestReviews.author: Laure L.
latestReviews.title: Positive Impact, Positive Returns
latestReviews.reviewText: One of the most impactful things individuals can do to fight climate change is to change their bank and superannuation to companies that actively divest from fossil fuels. Future Super does exactly that, whilst providing solid returns, and a great customer experience on top of things. I'm very happy I made the switch, and they made it so easy for me!

latestReviews.author: Sarah
latestReviews.title: Great return
latestReviews.reviewText: Great return in such a short time while been with FutureSuper, my partner has also noticed the increase, customer over two years. Thanks FutureSuper, keep up the great work go team

latestReviews.author: g g.
latestReviews.title: Very happy to have made the switch
latestReviews.reviewText: I joined Future Super just after Covid 19 hit. In a year of losses, I am happy to say that my Super has not lost a dollar in all that time.

latestReviews.author: miki
latestReviews.title: best ethical choice i have ever made
latestReviews.reviewText: good customer service, easy roll over, great to invest in renewables, best ethical choice I have ever made, keep up the good work, hopefully more people will change and switch to Future Super!!

latestReviews.author: Nigel M.
latestReviews.title: outstanding
latestReviews.reviewText: I've had my super managed in the past by at least 3 others and this has been by far my best and most comfortable and inspiring experience. just perfect. thank you.

latestReviews.author: Michael
latestReviews.title: Exceptional ethical super fund with high performing investment options
latestReviews.reviewText: 1.5 years with Future Super. Highly satisfied with performance of the renewables plus growth investment option. Great customer service and user-friendly online web interface. Also very satisfied with the insurance application process and rates reasonable fees.

latestReviews.author: April
latestReviews.title: Best thing I ever did
latestReviews.reviewText: Great Service, was easy to roll over from my other super account and amongst all of my friends, family and colleagues I am one of the few who did not lose money during the COVID19 crisis (at this present time). For me it was an ethical decision, as whilst I did not know where my money was being invested before, that was part of the problem, as it is easy to turn a blind eye to something you cannot see.

latestReviews.author: Paula P.
latestReviews.title: Ethics and performance
latestReviews.reviewText: I moved my super to future super for ethical reasons just over a year ago, however it has been the best performing super fund amongst my colleagues. What a Win/win

latestReviews.author: Kate Ringvall
latestReviews.title: Ethical Investing at it's best!
latestReviews.reviewText: I've been with Future Super since the started and have never regretted my choice. Ethical investing for my super is the only choice, for my children's future and the future of the planet.
